sentence: There is no ice machine on individual floors either so that means another expense to tip the room service staff
but reception offered us an array of take always that could be delivered so order pizza

My whole experience is not great Rooms are clean Staff is okay their Valet parking is very expensive I did not get the minimum requirements such as Refrigirator Ovan if you are visiting DC with family and Kids this is not the right one to stay I have booked this hotel thru expedia But unfortunately I did not have an option to cancel the reservation
The front desk was unattended and when the security guard notified the hotel employee who was on her cell phone on a personal call she did not respond
Shame really ruined all the hard work the staff did on my first visit
Dropping the keys off at the desk is fine but I was not sure what to do so a sign would have been helpful
I did have to call housekeeping a couple of times and maintenance staff as well
The front desk staff was much friendlier the doorman bellman and concierge staff jumped when a guest needed assistance you did not need to ask
The food was excellent but the closing hours for room service are ridiculous
Poor service at frontdesk had to change keys 4 times
Elizabeth at the front desk was so kind patient and helpful
His customer service exceeded our expectation
From the moment of arrival it was nice to be met with such finally staff
Kudos to Amber who greeted us at the front desk
The staff at this hotel is very kind and helpful I mostly remember the concierge kaouthar concierge
My three always fabulous stand outs are Innocent Kaouthar and RomeoAlways superb service and with a smile
The guy at the front desk was extremely nice and when we called down to request new sheets and a new iron they came up promptly
Kaouthar was very helpful with providing concierge services such as things to see and where to eat
The staff was awesome and even got us on a higher floor and in early for 25 night moreWas a great place for a weekend getaway to checkout DC
Kaouthar and Innocent run the concierge and make every stay a joy
